title: Act 2020 (No. 28 of 2020), and having consulted with the Minister for Justice
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Central Mental Hospital (Relocation)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Central Mental Hospital (Relocation) 

Act 2020 (Relocation Day) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited central mental hospital (relocation) act 2020 (relocation day) order 2022

title: Act 2020 (No. 28 of 2020), and having consulted with the Minister for Justice
heading: 2. The 13th day of November 2022 is appointed as the relocation day for
text_raw:
2. The 13th day of November 2022 is appointed as the relocation day for 
the purposes of the Central Mental Hospital (Relocation) Act 2020 (No. 28 of 
2020).
text_norm: 2 13th day november 2022 appointed relocation day purpose central mental hospital (relocation) act 2020 (no 28 2020)

title: Act 2020 (No. 28 of 2020), and having consulted with the Minister for Justice
heading: 3. The psychiatric centre, situated within the National Forensic Mental
text_raw:
3. The psychiatric centre, situated within the National Forensic Mental 
Health Service, Portrane, County Dublin, comprising the area consisting of the 
lands identified within the inner margins of the red lines, hatched in red and 
marked “Central Mental Hospital” on the deposited map, a true copy of which 
is attached in the Schedule to this Order, shall, on and after the relocation day, 
be known as the Central Mental Hospital.
text_norm: 3 psychiatric centre situated within national forensic mental health service portrane county dublin comprising area consisting land identified within inner margin red line hatched red marked central mental hospital deposited map true copy attached schedule order shall relocation day known central mental hospital
